data.title: Bowling Green State University
data.meta_description: Karl Rose (3) DB - 2001: Played in all 11 games...recorded 46 tackles (27 solo) and five for a loss...had three interceptions including two against Ohio...ha...
data.text:
2001: Played in all 11 games...recorded 46 tackles (27 solo) and five for a loss...had three interceptions including two against Ohio...had 13 pass deflections...2000: Played in all 11 games and started four games ... recorded 34 tackles (23 solo) ... fourth on team in tackles-for-loss with seven ... best performance came vs. Ohio when he made 13 tackles ... also had four pass deflections ... had two sacks and two fumble recoveries ... named special teams MVP against Kent State. 1999: Earned his second letter by playing in all 11 games ... started six games at free safety ... led the Falcons with a pair of interceptions ... picks came at Marshall and vs. Toledo ... had 11 tackles against the Rockets ... had his lone tackle behind the line at Kent. 1998: Earned a letter playing in all 11 games while starting eight times ... started the Central Florida game as the fifth defensive back, then started the next seven games at free safety ... despite limited playing time, finished fifth on the team in tackles with 60 stops ... had at least two tackles in every game ... had a high of 12 stops in the Miami game ... had eight tackles in the Kent and Western Michigan games ... also had one of BG's four interceptions ... returned the interception 39 yards in the Miami game before being tackled just short of the goal line ... also had six pass breakups, one fumble recovery, and one forced fumble. At Bishop Hartley H.S.: Was a two-year starter at wide receiver and defensive back for coach Dick Geyer ... also returned kicks both seasons ... was an All-Central Catholic League selection in the secondary both years ... was an honorable-mention all-district pick his senior season ... had 12 interceptions in his career and 30 receptions (14.0 avg.) to go along with six touchdowns ... was credited with 55 tackles his senior season and 45 his junior year ... helped Hartley to a 9-3 record as a senior making the Division V playoffs and advancing to the regional finals ... team had a 6-4 record his junior season ... they were tri-champs in the CCL his senior year and ranked among the top 10 programs in the state most of the season ... also lettered in basketball and track. Personal: Majoring in telecommunications ... son of Earl and Kathryn Rose ... born Dec. 28, 1979.
